name: Just Dance 2014
summary: Just Dance 2014 (also known as Just Dance 5) is the fifth game in the music game Just Dance franchise, developed by Ubisoft Paris, in collaboration with Ubisoft Milan, Ubisoft Reflections, Ubisoft Bucharest, Ubisoft Pune and Ubisoft Montpellier.
info:
• 中文名: 舞力全开2014

  • 别名: Just Dance 5

  • 平台: Xbox One
  • 平台: Xbox 360
  • 平台: PS4
  • 平台: PS3

  • 发行日期: 2013年10月1日
  • 售价: $39.99
